pma:database.name: shedmonitor
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `weather` ( `weatherID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `temp` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `feelsLike` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pressure` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT NULL, `humidity` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `readingTime` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`weatherID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
